item.title: EU agrees on complete ban of Russian gas imports by 2027 - dw.com
item.description: EU agrees on complete ban of Russian gas imports by 2027 dw.comEU countries give final approval to Russian gas ban ReutersHungary, Slovakia vow to sue EU over Russian gas ban politico.euRussian gas imports: Council gives final greenlight to a stepwise ban consilium.europa.euThe EU will halt all Russian gas imports into the bloc by late 2027, though not all member states supported the ban. facebook.com

item.title: Trump raises US tariffs on South Korea imports to 25%
item.description: Trump has accused Seoul of “not living up” to a trade deal that was reached last year.
